sentences.sContent: I went to school with him e_SEnD he was nasty then and he’s nasty now.
sentences.sCn: 我和他一起上过学他那时很讨厌，现在还是很讨厌。

synos.tran: 肮脏的；下流的；险恶的；脾气不好的

remMethod.val: 做事总是草率的(hasty)， 真是令人讨厌的(nasty)

trans.tranCn: 令人作呕的，令人不快的，下流的
trans.tranOther: someone who is nasty behaves in an unkind and unpleasant way
